Name: Grey Scout
About the game: Grey Scout is an atmospheric stealth game set on a rainy island. Step out of your boat, sneak through the lush meadows, and try to rescue as many guarded friends! 15-30 minutes of playtime. A simple, but dynamic, stealth mechanic. A lush island to explore. Cool procedural animations. 10 friends to find and rescue. 5 extra collectibles to find.
